Sequence Information.Peptide Name: B2RP-ERa (a brevinin-2-related peptide-ERa, natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; UCLL1c; XXA. More AMPs?)

Literature Information.Literature: Active against E. coli (MIC 12.5 uM), S. aureus (MIC12.5 uM) and C. albicans (MIC  50 uM). It is also active against antibiotic-resistant nosocomial isolates A. baumannii (MIC 6-12.5 uM). Hemolytic LC50 = 280 uM. Additional peptides have been reported with no activity data available. Updated 5/2020
Literature Information.Author: Al-Ghaferi N, Kolodziejek J, Nowotny N, Coquet L, Jouenne T, Leprince J, Vaudry H, King JD, Conlon JM2010
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from the skin secretions of the South-East Asian frog Hylarana erythraea (Ranidae).
